    • メソッドの詳細

      • saveObject

        public org.json.JSONObject saveObject(java.lang.String className,
                                      org.json.JSONObject params)
                               throws NCMBException
        Saving JSONObject data to NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to save the object
        params - Saving Object data
        戻り値:
        result of save object
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • saveObjectInBackground

        public void saveObjectInBackground(java.lang.String className,
                                   org.json.JSONObject params,
                                   ExecuteServiceCallback callback)
        Saving JSONObject data to NIFCLOUD mobile backend in background thread
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to save the object
        params - saving Object data
        callback - callback for after object save

      • fetchObject

        public NCMBObject fetchObject(java.lang.String className,
                              java.lang.String objectId)
                       throws NCMBException
        Fetching JSONObject data from NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to fetch the object
        objectId - Datastore object id of fetch data
        戻り値:
        NCMBObject of fetch data
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • fetchObjectInBackground

        public void fetchObjectInBackground(java.lang.String className,
                                    java.lang.String objectId,
                                    FetchCallback callback)
        Fetching JSONObject data from NIFCLOUD mobile backend in background thread
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to fetch the object
        objectId - Datastore object id of fetch data
        callback - callback for after object fetch

      • updateObject

        public org.json.JSONObject updateObject(java.lang.String className,
                                        java.lang.String objectId,
                                        org.json.JSONObject params)
                                 throws NCMBException
        Updating JSONObject data to NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to update the object
        objectId - Datastore object id of update data
        params - JSONObject of update data
        戻り値:
        JSONObject of update result
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend

                                     java.lang.String objectId,
                                     org.json.JSONObject params,
                                     ExecuteServiceCallback callback)

        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to update the object
        objectId - Datastore object id of update data
        params - JSONObject of update data
        callback - callback for after object update

      • searchObject

        public java.util.List searchObject(java.lang.String className,
                                   org.json.JSONObject conditions)
                            throws NCMBException
        Searching JSONObject data from NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to search the object
        conditions - JSONObject of search conditions
        戻り値:
        List of NCMBObject of search results
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • searchObjectInBackground

        public void searchObjectInBackground(java.lang.String className,
                                     org.json.JSONObject conditions,
                                     SearchObjectCallback callback)
        Searching JSONObject data to NIFCLOUD mobile backend in background thread
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to search the object
        conditions - JSONObject of search conditions
        callback - callback for after object search

      • countObject

        public int countObject(java.lang.String className,
                       org.json.JSONObject conditions)
                throws NCMBException
        Counting search object results from NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to search the object
        conditions - JSONObject of search conditions
        戻り値:
        number of search results
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • countObjectInBackground

        public void countObjectInBackground(java.lang.String className,
                                    org.json.JSONObject conditions,
                                    CountCallback callback)
        Counting search object results from NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        パラメータ:
        className - Datastore class name which to search the object
        conditions - JSONObject of search conditions
        callback - callback for after object search and count data
